properties.title: Family Life Church

properties.description: Helmsley Library offers a large selection of books and audiobooks that members can borrow. The Library has space to read newspapers and find out about community events and activities. We have free WiFi as well as access to computers which are free for 1hr per day. We run a regular Storytime every Tuesday at 10.30am which is free and does not require booking. We also have a Barclays Bank pop up every Thursday and Friday 10am-1pm. To find out more about library events and activities please check our Facebook page. The library is at the front of the Town Hall, centrally located in the marketplace. The 128, Stephenson's and 194 buses all stop in the marketplace. A short-stay pay car park is outside the library. Long-stay parking is available in the town and is clearly sign posted. The library is accessible to wheelchairs.
properties.title: Helmsley Library
